title: A NEW BUG/GLITCH
body:
I hav a bug with my account.I get chrash in the final of the match and now i push recconect and it didnt work and i got black screen.Please Riot i cant use my account for this bug or glitch.Riot you can repair my account and this bug/glitch.
                                                                                 anonymu2002
                                                      name in game :  I am anonymu

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having a hard time connecting  to the game server. This often happens if there are local network settings that aren't optimized for League and prevent a good link from happening. I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
